FuncDef:
The sflow export extended-route-data disable command disables an sFlow agent from collecting routing information.
The undo sflow export extended-route-data disable command enables an sFlow agent to collect routing information.
By default, an sFlow agent is enabled to collect routing information.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An sFlow agent collects routing information about user packets, consuming CPU resources on the sFlow agent. To conserve CPU resources if you do not need this information, run the sflow export extended-route-data disable command to disable collection on the sFlow agent.
